p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt;

div.p:
Think if positive promises of votes from Queensland & south Australia could be obtained Sydney Govt might render second thousand available at once exploring aird
New Guinea river. Steam Launch useful anyhow various services
For more details, see M to E. Strickland, 27 March 1885.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 12pt; text-align: end;
